title: Good atmosphere, bad plot
review: Above average for a horror movie, really immersive for the most part. The acting of the main cast is often over delivered. Plays out as a mystery where you try to figure out what is happening. The ending is extremely anti-climactic.

movie_title: What We Do in the Shadows
title: Tasteful, fun and creative
review: Chockful of witty situational comedy and some slightly graphical gore scenes. Highly recommended
